sample(double[]) - Method in class main.AbstractCurve
Sample some number of points
Provided here only because certain subclasses cannot gain any performance advantage with code tailored to them

setBufferSize(int) - Method in class main.Session
Sets the buffer size in samples
setBufferSizeLog(int) - Method in class main.Session
Sets the buffer size in samples to 2^n
setGlobals(HashMap<String, Object>) - Method in interface main.Synthesizer
Sets the variables variable so it can be manipulated or read
Should be called before spawning voices
shallowCopy(MetaType) - Method in interface main.BetterClone
Shallow copy, generally returns a different object with copied fields
If metaData is null (likely because a user didn't know) and an object is expected, use some form of default
showFrameDefault(JInternalFrame) - Static method in class util.ui.PivotSwingUtils
Pops open the frame, if it exists
slice(int, int) - Method in class main.Samples
Returns a slice of the sampled data
Length of copied data will be end - start
spawnLiveVoice(int) - Method in interface main.Synthesizer
Create a single live voice with the specified pitch
Used for real time previews and stuff
Since only one is needed, direct return is fine
spawnVoices(double[][], TrackLayerSimple, int) - Method in interface main.Synthesizer
Use array of double arrays to indicate which clips need to be created
Inner double arrays are [delay,length,pitch]
The synthesizer should have the rest of the necessary data already
Should add voices to the target

speedMult - Variable in class main.MetaSamples

stopPlay() - Method in interface main.Player
Stop all audio playback
stopPlay() - Method in class main.PlayerDoubleBuffer
 
Synthesizer - Interface in main
Generic synthesizer interface, shared with Java and Python
Used in tandem with patterns to generate voices which may rely on the synthesizer
